column1: Harenkarspel (pronunciation ) is a former municipality in the Netherlands
column2: in the province of North Holland and the region of West-Frisia. The main town of Harenkarspel was Tuitjenhorn. In 2013
column3: Harenkarspel merged with Schagen and Zijpe into a new municipality

column1: The former municipality of Harenkarspel consisted of the following villages: Dirkshorn
column14: and Warmenhuizen. The largest towns were Warmenhuizen and Tuitjenhorn. The town hall of Harenkarspel was located in Tuitjenhorn.

column1: The municipal council of Harenkarspel consisted of 17 seats
Statistics are taken from the SDU Staatscourant
